Html:
Hi all,

How is it going? I would like to make it work for both of 2003 and 2007, but currently it's only working on 2007.

Could you please tell me how to fix this problem?

Here is my code as below:

<font size="2">

 

</font>

$filename = test.'.xls';

header('Content-Type: application/vnd.ms-excel');<font size="2">

<font size="2">

$objWriter->save('php://output');

exit;

What are the <font size="2"> and </font> in your sample code?

Are you getting any error messages? Have you set your code to display all errors?

Is a file being generated?

File is generated but the problem is that excel file can't get an image file on excel 2003, but working good on excel 2007.

You can ignore <font></font>. Just pretend it's not <font></font> there, once I have posted my code, it's automatically created on forum.

Errors were deteced in 'report.xls', but Microsoft Office Excel was able to open the file by making the repairs listed below.

Save the file to make these repairs permenent. Damage to the file was so extensive that repairs were not possible. Excel attempted to recover your formulas and values, but some data may have been lost or corrupted.
